name: Imagine Golf Club
tag_list: golf, social-networking, golfers, golfing, sports, social-network
overview:
Imagine Golf Club is a social networking platform for both golf professionals and enthusiasts alike. Imagine Golf Club is backed by key celebrities within the sport and provides up to the minute live news feeds, informed commentary, playing tips and celebrity blogs.

Our powerful search tools will allow enthusiasts to find a golf professional or golf club locally or anywhere in Europe. They will be able to read and submit golf course reviews.

Golf enthusiasts can register as a member of the Imagine Golf Club and create and customise their own profile page, which will allow them to create shortcuts to their favourite areas of the site such as news or commentary, play online games, earn points to spend in the Imagine Golf Club Shop, win prizes and communicate with their friends via chat and messaging.
